data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_85ff988c6660b4d04f8dd3d40df988bb.png

skilllist.skilldesc: When Johnson's HP drops below 30%, he gains a 300<font color="26e407"> (+700% Total Physical Defense)</font> shield for 10s. Cooldown: 100s.

Johnson throws his wrench toward the target location, dealing 120<font color="26e407"> (+220% Total Physical Defense)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path. Enemies around the landing point are stunned for 0.8s.

Johnson raises his shield, continuously dealing 80<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area in the target direction and slowing them by 20%. Each instance of damage also increases the enemy's subsequent damage taken from the skill by 15% (up to 45%). This damage is increased by 60% against creeps.

Johnson can cast Basic Attacks and skills for the duration.

Johnson transforms into a car and begins accelerating over time. An allied hero can use <font color="a6aafb">Hop In</font> when near Johnson to board the car (only 1 allied hero can ride with Johnson). The car will explode upon hitting an enemy hero or obstacle, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+160% Total Magic Power)</font>-450<font color="62f8fe"> (+280% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5-1s (scales with the car's speed before impact), and creating an electrified zone at the location. The zone continuously deals 60<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and slows enemies within. While in car state, tap <font color="a6aafb">Brake</font> to stop immediately or hold <font color="a6aafb">Nitrous</font> to continuously gain speed for up to 5s. Johnson's location will be revealed to the enemy team for 3s when casting this skill.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Johnson's Physical Defense is increased by 10%.

+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: When HP is below <%Num1>, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by <Num2>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+0.07 Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Encourage:
equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Encourage: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+15% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Crit Damage Reduction
+70 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: Vatangame Esports Blotzfet
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A super cyborg who can transform into a car and lead his teammates into battle.

assist.desc: Johnson works well with heroes that need help initiating like Odette and Kadita since they can just jump into Johnson's Ultimate for a ride.

strong.desc:
Johnson counters melee heroes with high burst like Alucard and Zilong
because of Johnson's high Physical Defense and CC ability.

weak.desc: Johnson is countered by agile heroes who deal Magic Damage such as Harith and Kagura because they can easily dodge Johnson's skills while their damage is not affected by his Physical Defense.
